algorithms.graph
Interface Operation

All Known Implementing Classes:
CascadingStateMerge, GraphMerge, OperationSequence, PartitionMerge, PartitionMultiMerge, PartitionMultiSplit, PartitionSplit, ReverseTraceroute.ReplaceOperation, StateMerge, StateSplit
public interface Operation

Interface for operations on PartitionGraphs

Author:
sigurd

Method Summary
 Operation commit(PartitionGraph g, IModifiableGraph<Partition> partitionGraph, IModifiableGraph<SystemState<Partition>> stateGraph)
          Commit the changes to graphs partitionGraph and stateGraph, and return an operation that will rewind them.
 

Method Detail

commit

Operation commit(PartitionGraph g,
                 IModifiableGraph<Partition> partitionGraph,
                 IModifiableGraph<SystemState<Partition>> stateGraph)
Commit the changes to graphs partitionGraph and stateGraph, and return an operation that will rewind them.

Parameters:
partitionGraph - the partition graph to apply to
stateGraph - the partition graph that corresponds to the state graph
Returns:
an operation that will undo the changes
